amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Homeland Security to include satellite communications in the secure comminication plan required by the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 and printed in Part B of House Report 109-347 to require the Secretary of Homeland Security to include satellite communications in the plan authorized by Section 106 of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Carter amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
